title: PBE Logging in forever?
body:
So I got into PBE this this past thursday, and downloaded it according to the instructions on the site. Everything went smoothly, up until I went to log in using my PBE account. It Authorizes, then then i'm stuck with it telling me i'm logging in(Never get past that part). I thought it would be a corrupted file, so I uninstalled and re-downloaded it, and the same issue occurs.
Am I doing something wrong? or?

replies.body: Thank you! We are looking into it right now!
A lot of people are having this issue, including me.  I am pretty  sure it is a bug.
Have you found anyone that has resolved this issue?

Im also having the same issue.
{{summoner:3}}
Ok good I thought it was just me
